meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Loni Geerlings Neal Pollack Matt Volk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6672.

td.p: Loni Geerlings, an editor from Redwood City, California
Neal Pollack, a writer from Austin, Texas
Matt Volk, a financial analyst from Cedar Rapids, Iowa (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,400)

tr.td: NON-POTENT POTABLES
NOVEL WIVES
OH, "G"!
THE LEAGUE-LEADING STAT
APPS
(Alex: And a lot of the clues in that category will be delivered by CNN correspondents or reporters.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Mix ginger ale & grenadine & garnish with fruit & you get the alcohol-free cocktail named for this child star')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Mix ginger ale & grenadine & garnish with fruit & you get the alcohol-free cocktail named for this child star

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Mary Todd Lincoln

Loni
')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Sumnima Udas of CNN gives the clue from a boat in a river.) The pollution level of Delhi\'s Yamuna River more than doubled from 1993 to 2005; among the main culprits are these chemicals from the abundant agricultural land upriver')

tr.td: (Sumnima Udas of CNN gives the clue from a boat in a river.) The pollution level of Delhi's Yamuna River more than doubled from 1993 to 2005; among the main culprits are these chemicals from the abundant agricultural land upriver

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(Loni: What is gravitational?)
[The animation shows a geostationary satellite over the U.S., but geostationary orbits can exist only over the equator.]

geostationary (or geosynchronous)

Loni
Triple Stumper
')

NealWhat is the Sun?
$12,000
The Sun')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
